mcq.statement: In the human heart, why is the wall of the right ventricle thicker than the wall of the right atrium?

options.a: The right atrium must pump blood all the way around the body
options.b: The chambers have different oxygen concentrations
options.c: The right ventricle must exert a greater force than the right atrium
options.d: The right ventricle receives more blood than the right atrium
